participant_1.background:
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
I make sure my pets are happy, fed, and loved before I start my day.
i have a cat named pickles.
i try to limit how much meat i eat for health reasons.
I need to remind myself to eat healthier foods.

participant_2.background:
I am a patient with a chronic illness, but I try to make the most of my life by donating time and money to charity.
i love to snack between meals.
I'm looking forward to starting a new life in a new state with my dog.
i like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I check in with my pup.

content.text: Hello, I'm looking forward to connecting with new people today!
Hey there, I am looking forward to it too! What are some of your interests?
I love to read and spend time with my pets. I have a cat named pickles.
Oh that's so cute! I love cats too! I have a dog named Bailey.
I have a lot of health issues so I try to eat healthy foods to stay healthy.
I am a patient with a chronic illness, but I try to make the most of my life by donating time and money to charity.
That's really great of you! I'm glad you are able to find ways to give back despite your circumstances.
Thank you! I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
That's a wonderful goal! I hope you are able to achieve it.
I hope so too! Where are you from?
I am from California. Where are you from?
I'm from Minnesota. I'm looking forward to starting a new life in a new state with my dog.
That's exciting! I hope you have a great time in your new state
